page.title: 09Ombersley's Farms
page.content: We sent a questionaire to the{farmers in our area.We then worked out the averages of some of their answers.We found out that the average{size}of the farms was 195 acres.The main crop grown is{cereal crops,}each farm growing an average of 111 acres.The average acreage of{grassland}is 61,this is used for grazing ,hay and silage.The next most important crop grown is{potatoes}with each farm growing an average of 5 acres.Other crops grown are: stick beans,sprouts, cabbage, swede, cauliflower, peas and fodder beet. The types of{animals}kept are: beef cattle such as Fresians and Herefords, sheep, horses and hens.The average{number of workers}on each farm is just less than 3.Most farms have about 2{houses}on them.Farms have ,on average about 5{tractors.}There is one combine harvester for every 2 farms.
